title: AFK ban should be different on internet problem
body:
I have lots of internet problem. Its because where i live its perfectly fine but 2 times a day it crash and i get lots and lots of afk ban from it.
You guys should shorten the ban because it isn't our fault but we still made team lose...
I think that you could do this by just check their ping if their ping goes over 700 or 1000 2 or 3 time should be counted as lagging hard and if they are dc and back dc and back for few times should be counted as a lag to.
Thanks very much for reading my report.

Thanks riot for telling me what to do I'm not really good at this kind of thing thanks.

replies.body: You are still making the experience worse for 9 other people. If you dc consistently you need to figure out what is causing it and fix it before you continue playing.

Correct! Here are the resources to do so:

* [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
* [Help & Support Board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M)
* [Submit a Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
I could just pull out the Plug then and blame it on Internet Problems. Wont happen

i know all the things could happen thats y i meant by shorten the ban like 20 for 3 time 10 min 5 or wat ever and what i said is a example, someone mite have better ideas but thanks for the all the comments
